item.description:
Hi All,

This is a great local series of races which for the last few years has had some pretty good weather for it too... seems like the half marathon is always the most popular. http://www.hyannismarathon.com/index.php (The Marathon is 2 laps of the half marathon course.)

It's close enough to drive to on the Sunday morning so if you're able to offer a ride (or need one) then please mark it on your reply too... also, it'll likely sell out so you may want to register asap.

~ Martin

p.s. Obvious to say but putting a "yes" on here doesn't mean you're registered... you're responsible for your own registration fees etc. through the website above :)

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Hyannis Half Marathon
